languages.text: "Я предполагал, что это — последствия системного шока от атаки схизматикаля. Но речи моего технобрата указывают на более глубинные причины его беспокойства. Он что-то провидит... Что-то угрожающее ему и всем, кто вокруг него. Потому я готов встретить угрозу".

"I assumed at first that this was caused by the shock inflicted upon his system by the schismatical attack. But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."
languages.original_text: "Я предполагал, что это — последствия системного шока от атаки схизматикаля. Но речи моего технобрата указывают на более глубинные причины его беспокойства. Он что-то провидит... Что-то угрожающее ему и всем, кто вокруг него. Потому я готов встретить угрозу".

But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我一开始以为是分离者对他的系统造成了冲击，但技术兄弟的话语让我明白，他的不安源自更深层次的原因。他预见到……某种东西会威胁到他，以及他身边的人。因此我已经做好了准备，愿意应对这样的威胁。”
languages.original_text: "I assumed at first that this was caused by the shock inflicted upon his system by the schismatical attack. But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."

traits.locale_text: “我一开始以为是分离者对他的系统造成了冲击，但技术兄弟的话语让我明白，他的不安源自更深层次的原因。他预见到……某种东西会威胁到他，以及他身边的人。因此我已经做好了准备，愿意应对这样的威胁。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「最初は分離派の攻撃により彼のシステムがショックを受けたせいだと思っていました。しかし彼の言葉は彼の不安の、より深い理由を示すものでした。彼は何かを…予見したのです。自身とその周囲の者を脅かす何かを。だから自分はこうしてその脅威に立ち向かうべく待ち構えているのです」
languages.original_text: "I assumed at first that this was caused by the shock inflicted upon his system by the schismatical attack. But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."

traits.locale_text: 「最初は分離派の攻撃により彼のシステムがショックを受けたせいだと思っていました。しかし彼の言葉は彼の不安の、より深い理由を示すものでした。彼は何かを…予見したのです。自身とその周囲の者を脅かす何かを。だから自分はこうしてその脅威に立ち向かうべく待ち構えているのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai d'abord supposé que c'était causé par le choc que l'attaque schismatique a infligé à son système. Mais les paroles de mon technofrère indiquent une cause plus profonde à son malaise. Il prévoit... quelque chose. Quelque chose qui les menace, lui et tous ceux qui l'entourent. Et je me tiens donc prêt à affronter cette menace. »
languages.original_text: "I assumed at first that this was caused by the shock inflicted upon his system by the schismatical attack. But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai d'abord supposé que c'était causé par le choc que l'attaque schismatique a infligé à son système. Mais les paroles de mon technofrère indiquent une cause plus profonde à son malaise. Il prévoit... quelque chose. Quelque chose qui les menace, lui et tous ceux qui l'entourent. Et je me tiens donc prêt à affronter cette menace. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Al principio pensé que era por la conmoción que había sufrido su sistema tras el ataque cismático. Pero, a juzgar por sus palabras, creo que su desasosiego está producido por una razón de más peso. Está prediciendo algo... Algo que lo pone en peligro a él y a los que están a su alrededor. Y por eso me preparo para enfrentarme a esta amenaza».
languages.original_text: "I assumed at first that this was caused by the shock inflicted upon his system by the schismatical attack. But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."

traits.locale_text: «Al principio pensé que era por la conmoción que había sufrido su sistema tras el ataque cismático. Pero, a juzgar por sus palabras, creo que su desasosiego está producido por una razón de más peso. Está prediciendo algo... Algo que lo pone en peligro a él y a los que están a su alrededor. Y por eso me preparo para enfrentarme a esta amenaza».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte zunächst vermutet, es liegt an dem Schock, den sein System durch den Angriff der Abtrünnigen erlitten hat. Aber die Worte meines Tech-Bruders deuten auf einen tieferen Grund für sein Unbehagen hin. Er sieht etwas ... voraus. Etwas, das ihn selbst und alle um ihn herum bedroht. Also stehe ich bereit, um dieser Bedrohung die Stirn zu bieten."
languages.original_text: "I assumed at first that this was caused by the shock inflicted upon his system by the schismatical attack. But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte zunächst vermutet, es liegt an dem Schock, den sein System durch den Angriff der Abtrünnigen erlitten hat. Aber die Worte meines Tech-Bruders deuten auf einen tieferen Grund für sein Unbehagen hin. Er sieht etwas ... voraus. Etwas, das ihn selbst und alle um ihn herum bedroht. Also stehe ich bereit, um dieser Bedrohung die Stirn zu bieten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "İlk aşamada buna, sistemine düzenlenen bölücü saldırısının yarattığı şokun sebep olduğunu varsaymıştım. Fakat Tekno kardeşimin sözleri, huzursuzluğunun daha derin bir sebebi olduğunu işaret etmekte. Bir şeyler... Öngörmekte. Hem kendisini hem de çevresindekileri tehdit eden bir şeyler. Ben de bu tehditle yüzleşmeye hazır hâlde beklemekteyim."
languages.original_text: "I assumed at first that this was caused by the shock inflicted upon his system by the schismatical attack. But my tech-brother's words are a sign of a deeper reason for his unease. He foresees... something. Something that threatens both him and all those around him. And thus I stand ready to face this threat."

traits.locale_text: "İlk aşamada buna, sistemine düzenlenen bölücü saldırısının yarattığı şokun sebep olduğunu varsaymıştım. Tekno kardeşimin sözleri, huzursuzluğunun daha derin bir sebebi olduğuna işaret etmekte ama. Bir şeyler... Öngörmekte. Hem kendisini hem de çevresindekileri tehdit eden bir şeyler. Ben de bu tehditle yüzleşmeye hazır hâlde beklemekteyim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
